message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, which I believe will bring great value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a fair price considering its unique features and benefits.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1500000 for it.

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1700000. This is a compromise that should work for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1600000.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving too much on the table. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1650000. This is my best offer so far, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $1625000 for the product.

I'm not ready to give up yet, Bob. I think we're close, but I need to get a bit closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1675000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at this price.
I understand your position, Alice. After reviewing the situation again, I would like to propose a price of $1650000 for the product.
I'm not willing to budge much more, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1680000. This is my last serious offer, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $1660000 for the product.
